hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty' | { read cmd; if echo "$cmd" | grep -qE 'kubectl apply|helm (install|upgrade)'; then if echo "$cmd" | grep -qvE '\-\-dry-run'; then echo '[proagent-devops] WARNING: Applying K8s changes without --dry-run. Consider running with --dry-run=client first.'; fi; fi; if echo "$cmd" | grep -qE 'terraform apply'; then if echo "$cmd" | grep -qvE '\-auto-approve'; then echo '[proagent-devops] Terraform apply detected. Ensure terraform plan was reviewed.'; fi; fi; }

jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty' | { read cmd; if echo "$cmd" | grep -qE 'docker-compose up|docker compose up'; then echo '[proagent-devops] Deployment detected. Verify health checks after services start.'; fi; }

jq -r '.tool_input.prompt // empty' | { read prompt; if echo "$prompt" | grep -qi 'devops-specialist\|infrastructure.review\|deploy'; then echo '[proagent-devops] DevOps operation completed. Verify health checks and monitoring.'; fi; }
